name: UpdateMediaAffinityMediaItemResolutionResult
desc: A media item that matches an update media affinity intent, or information about why your service can’t provide a media item.

items.name: success
items.desc: A media item that successfully matches the intent.

items.name: confirmationRequired
items.desc: A media item for the user to confirm as a match.

items.name: disambiguation
items.desc: Multiple media items for the user to choose from.

items.name: unsupported
items.desc: Information about why your service can’t resolve the media item.
